title: Mitmweb Crash
body:
### Problem Description



#### Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. mitmweb -nr [repro.mitm](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18782118/repro.zip)
2. Select the first flow.
3. Go to the error tab.
4. Select the second flow.

### System Information

```raw
Mitmproxy: 11.1.2 binary
Python:    3.13.1
OpenSSL:   OpenSSL 3.4.0 22 Oct 2024
Platform:  macOS-15.3-arm64-arm-64bit-Mach-O
```

### Checklist

- [x] This bug affects the [latest mitmproxy release](https://github.com/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/releases).
